channel.title: Volunteer Editors Needed!
channel.description:
The Ceramics Wiki is looking for volunteer editors. Editors' primary responsibility is archiving knowledge from Ceramics Recipes to the wiki. Anyone with a bit of spare time, a basic knowledge of computers, and a love for organizing is welcome! Existing wiki members will assist newcomers in learning how to use the system.
The Ceramics Wiki is non-profit. All knowledge stored in the wiki is freely available to everyone, even outside of Facebook.
For an example, recent discussions about crazing in glazes is being added to the article at https://wiki.glazy.org/t/glaze-crazing/
More information here: https://wiki.glazy.org/t/volunteer-editors-needed/
